attributes.action: Withdraw the London Olympic logo and replace it with something better
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new Olympic logo is awful. Remove it before it shames the nation any further.

The British public have come up with far better ideas for a logo. The current logo is poor and a waste of money.

Let us have a public competition and vote to choose the logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
